item.description:
Sorry we missed you in April! We're making up for it this month with several wonderful opportunities for you!

It's easy to be happy when "things" are going well; but how do you stay in your happy zone and vibrate high at other times?

Tonight we'll be discussing and learning "How can I be happy when....?" First we'll discuss as a group together. Then we'll get in smaller groups or pairs to work through and practice your own specific examples.

Hoping we'll have time for a nice, little guided meditation, too!

You're sure to leave feeling "good, good, good, good vibrations"! (Beach Boys song)

Please remember to RSVP, and after you do so, please let us know if your plans change, so we wonâ€™t be waiting for you unnecessarily.

Check out our calendar for details on our community cookout on Sat. the 22nd, too! We've even got fun entertainment with a mentalist lined up!

Lastly, remember to set your preferences to receive our e-mails and be able to participate in message board discussions. (Go to your Account. Then on the Membership and Communication link. Then under our meetup, click on edit e-mail settings.) Let's amp up the value we can gain by sharing more information and tips, etc. and building a greater sense of community and connection. Connected people are happier people!

There's nothing better than feeling good and having fun. Please join us!

Eagerly looking forward to co-creating with you!

Ann and Mark
item.how_to_find_us: Go to back of front lobby, near water cooler and go upstairs.

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: "How can I be happy when...?"
